question: Who has won gold in men's senior 50m pistol event at the 61st National Shooting Championships Competition (NSCC-2017)?
explanation: In Shooting, ace Indian marksman Jitu Rai won the men\'s 50-metre pistol national title, setting a new record score of 233 at the 61st National Shooting Championships Competition (NSCC-2017) in Thiruvananthapuram. Rai also won the team gold in the event combining with Jai and Omprakash Mitherwal for a total of 1658, besting Team Air Force, who managed a total of 1626. Arjun Singh Cheema of Punjab won the junior menâ€™s 50-metre pistol event. A total of 4800 men and women shooters from across the country are participating in the Championship including 200 wildcard entries.
